question: During the reign of which of the following kings the Rashtrakuta empire became a pan-Indian power?
explanation: The Rashtrakuta Dynasty ruled parts of South India from the 8th to the 10th century CE. The rise of Rashtrakuta Kingdom began when Dantidurga defeated King Kirtivarman II in 753 CE but the  Rashtrakutas became a pan- Indian power during the rule of the king Dhruva.
